name: mass spectrometer
description: An analytical technique used to measure the mass-to-charge ratio of ions.

name: weight scale
description: A device used to measure the weight of an object.

name: freeze-dryer
description: A device used to remove moisture from a sample by freezing it and then reducing the surrounding pressure.

name: ball mill
description: A device used to grind materials with beads

name: centrifuge
description: A device that uses centrifugal force to separate components of a mixture based on density.

name: dispenser
description: A device used to dispense a specific amount of liquid or powder.
